# 

Nasdaq Executives to Present at Upcoming Investor Conferences

Nov 5, 2024 

[Download PDF](/node/108256/pdf)

NEW YORK, Nov. 05, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) will be presenting at the following conferences in November with webcasts available at Nasdaq’s Investor Relations website: [ir.nasdaq.com/events.cfm](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=66F3AXPZMODdHKQ4DaQnn35mVINvDCE6fG0dFWDPaQQXN5KBZcFGRLHyWdkf_LNfUxsh302THqiBwL9ZWBgnxMU1LOgVWvoek8HRNVkC0w2Mhelxdw1du3v9ZeaR5KmwH7axu8hQ0GLukTGZBqITfw==).

**Who** : | Adena Friedman, Chair and CEO, Nasdaq  
---|---  
**What** : | J.P. Morgan Ultimate Services Investor Conference  
**When** : | Thursday, November 14, 2024  
2:30 PM ET  
**Who** : | Sarah Youngwood, Executive Vice President & CFO, Nasdaq  
**What** : | RBC Capital Markets Technology, Internet, Media and Telecommunications Conference  
**When** : | Tuesday, November 19, 2024  
9:20 AM ET  
  
**About Nasdaq**

Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) is a global technology company serving corporate clients, investment managers, banks, brokers, and exchange operators as they navigate and interact with the global capital markets and the broader financial system. We aspire to deliver world-leading platforms that improve the liquidity, transparency, and integrity of the global economy. Our diverse offering of data, analytics, software, exchange capabilities, and client-centric services enables clients to optimize and execute their business vision with confidence. To learn more about the company, technology solutions and career opportunities, visit us on [LinkedIn](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=dcz_8MF8SF-T3xd-c3o9KVac_ZZ3u9WkYS_3FO2L5KzdJ48JcLMjQtza4Mf6Oui0Lc-3L6iuj9R0ysCO_jSUI-WjvQEM54dybPYOYUM7qsE=), on X [@Nasdaq](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=95s4zlnLjXn10oVZfmIwQ-ApodoojP4w8yVpYHwwxJcKfH1n9UHw739y_ewgjP43q9CyFGmTCSxaKHAAY5S5vA==), or at [www.nasdaq.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=qJAyZW8zDjlnDxPJCbHXMHrvcywbKi_AYkRBtqNRy77BzfstOJS8O5TLOAX8IkTd7B9jyepAv7c8RSpxNOaTTQ==).

# 

Nasdaq Reports October 2024 Volumes

Nov 4, 2024 

[Download PDF](/node/108236/pdf)

NEW YORK, Nov. 04, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) today reported monthly volumes for October 2024 on its Investor Relations website. A data sheet showing this information can be found at: [http://ir.nasdaq.com/financials/volume-statistics](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=mWJLjDhMniL6nYveHPc3WYvnutHzo_EyNUQiRIdW_0xMjQoORSFcTVqbX74HtbT3TXtGb9T7D2v6F6sA7IL7L8YhMwtXsQvt5GSF-9ipqCi8sfaNFC_iV7Du13aFLKvKAshX3M7k_y-nvHz1M9mulEJNORnxaBKglrfThd-0gO0=)[.](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=YwKsLFr9aiXyZV5CUvs9jeTxCsZMNsSUwI8iYz4TZPJkVbzWgRQXdNW1Wht01Dgh2-7wJmHmBz4WdmPIFWFxeyEN3OODUqhuL_QuUlyOjxY=)

**About Nasdaq**

Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) is a leading global technology company serving corporate clients, investment managers, banks, brokers, and exchange operators as they navigate and interact with the global capital markets and the broader financial system. We aspire to deliver world-leading platforms that improve the liquidity, transparency, and integrity of the global economy. Our diverse offering of data, analytics, software, exchange capabilities, and client-centric services enables clients to optimize and execute their business vision with confidence. To learn more about the company, technology solutions, and career opportunities, visit us on [LinkedIn](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=WOpEeicbvMnaGV5t2BEplU-wFlkKXRH9rvkb4n7CgT1teFsu2EsYqedFkrLXoztYSjNWpGPwJV66Yg5iT-I5pxlSuftX26KQ7MoVxjrlD3M=), on X [@Nasdaq](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=sZgdmrn_FdlbJKUZm5zA6VlX2S_KG9SfUwk2Hr_Nlwe1vw9avT2nHs3GNn_cB8ukVY5RCtNK-dxaZYybqVjuTw==), or at [www.nasdaq.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=h-8_6R8OVesBJCYykbX03bT8y9fCh7IEVreIlCJRC4bmGjpd9D-duvbHgGaCjd7O6qBRsJejlt02wHuS4O9G0w==).

**Cautionary Note Regarding Forward-Looking Statements** _Information set forth in this communication contains forward-looking statements that involve a number of risks and uncertainties. Nasdaq cautions readers that any forward-looking information is not a guarantee of future performance and that actual results could differ materially from those contained in the forward-looking information. Such forward-looking statements include, but are not limited to (i) projections relating to our future financial results, total shareholder returns, growth, trading volumes, products and services, ability to transition to new business models, taxes and achievement of synergy targets, (ii) statements about the closing or implementation dates and benefits of certain acquisitions, divestitures and other strategic, restructuring, technology, de-leveraging and capital allocation initiatives, (iii) statements about our integrations of our recent acquisitions, (iv) statements relating to any litigation or regulatory or government investigation or action to which we are or could become a party, and (v) other statements that are not historical facts. Forward-looking statements involve a number of risks, uncertainties or other factors beyond Nasdaq’s control. # 

Nasdaq Announces Quarterly Dividend of $0.24 Per Share

Oct 24, 2024 

[Download PDF](/node/108161/pdf)

NEW YORK, Oct. 24, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Directors of Nasdaq, Inc. (Nasdaq: NDAQ) has declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.24 per share on the company's outstanding common stock. The dividend is payable on December 20, 2024 to shareholders of record at the close of business on December 6, 2024. Future declarations of quarterly dividends and the establishment of future record and payment dates are subject to approval by the Board of Directors.

**About Nasdaq**

Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) is a leading global technology company serving corporate clients, investment managers, banks, brokers, and exchange operators as they navigate and interact with the global capital markets and the broader financial system. We aspire to deliver world-leading platforms that improve the liquidity, transparency, and integrity of the global economy. Our diverse offering of data, analytics, software, exchange capabilities, and client-centric services enables clients to optimize and execute their business vision with confidence. To learn more about the company, technology solutions, and career opportunities, visit us on [LinkedIn](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=UmmcSUJvQt19iZRTnmOumuPuDCza3i6S9QDZZWqHFouSZExDqGVI4NKHoBfLJ7P533P4bI_GxWh-c9ImDIY9oDNvMMqVEPRRSM6v7_oAA3ffyDw-Yw5KfFijEc5mPF1-EZMwkA5vlreblsD1Mco9vVFK5kSnF2z4DVjTUZXST0WDAsOZ2eh6reVEjk6DHWwpOxrfxaQ8N6VExw8LwkZeyBI410qs2C7cgHA5PYb4bD5bCYWj3xnBtTdyIt60gCKy), on X [@Nasdaq](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=aNh0TWWkML8tkGpKYeNxelf9k5A8BNItmsd2ACFxm6Q9ns0q8jCVxNr0QNHtbTtZ5Pb6FYgJUhZZ7faC6BmiOaXmlMEHBBM2ctWHIRFl8UpwBehwTVf3QmTQzKNT47Rxcd3KVEVoKRfVynQFNRmW1n1iKAOy3UzsCY0X9X2uRUuisixz_ZoykK_qJ1XthRlbUD6D9eA64BgnW3KK1YpOIgXOF5WM-2EsVcghboS4eS8=), or at [www.nasdaq.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=LjBqL6dNPPLqKeyD7jMFNs4KUuPS7bBR9Rq3XrIzrk_V9xEYQ_ugJvRJNv8zbgeDTvRA3laSGc4lxW6lpcKbQkUz1cJ5cp1IRvyy9rHd24oFSVJfObcEesB6ioe1bvXkq0g7S3uN9mntB1Q4sH8XsNmsW92yLE8eF1JWUurRBUgXWIGFgx7PYSJIun-qyjAIfA6VZ9Gp24qSNAOxDMyVAN9wBnid1LgXMBOcIcjlxNM=).

**Cautionary Note Regarding Forward-Looking Statements**

_Information set forth in this communication contains forward-looking statements that involve a number of risks and uncertainties. Nasdaq cautions readers that any forward-looking information is not a guarantee of future performance and that actual results could differ materially from those contained in the forward-looking information. Such forward-looking statements include, but are not limited to, information regarding our dividend program and future payment obligations. Forward-looking statements involve a number of risks, uncertainties or other factors beyond Nasdaq’s control. These factors include, but are not limited to, Nasdaq’s ability to implement its strategic initiatives, economic, political and market conditions and fluctuations, government and industry regulation, interest rate risk, U.S. and global competition, and other factors detailed in Nasdaq’s filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, including its annual reports on Form 10-K and quarterly reports on Form 10-Q which are available on Nasdaq’s investor relations website at <http://ir.nasdaq.com> and the SEC’s website at [www.sec.gov](http://www.sec.gov). Nasdaq undertakes no obligation to publicly update any forward-looking statement, whether as a result of new information, future events or otherwise._

# 

Nasdaq Reports September 2024 Volumes and 3Q24 Statistics

Oct 7, 2024 

[Download PDF](/node/108076/pdf)

NEW YORK, Oct. 07, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) today reported monthly volumes for September 2024, as well as quarterly volumes, estimated revenue capture, number of listings, and index statistics for the quarter ended September 30, 2024, on its Investor Relations website.

A data sheet showing this information can be found at: [http://ir.nasdaq.com/financials/volume-statistics](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=T7m9dVO5DFa6WetOj80gqhp_yiu5LRR_CbraN5fCX-9WAJJXOM6T4aOaXEqreZhRZJ0LfpWZ2LaT2PjuMUUjJdjtgh8vc5rhmQbFIUw5Uyd5oTYc17q-CtIm2cL6l1QjMaZyLFw8ymkG1Syz_mF23jRFQjAIiLlXKZ4Bo7brBxQ=)[. ](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=hy_hGn8w3XMvQh2vPF0FffPuJmBa65x9mWOA7DctuT_zGkeW4_jF0wr7maJ8NvsXOILcnNcyvY7j53r8z9vOopuGEC0S7vRoHhYJutHzihU=)

**About Nasdaq**

Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) is a leading global technology company serving corporate clients, investment managers, banks, brokers, and exchange operators as they navigate and interact with the global capital markets and the broader financial system. We aspire to deliver world-leading platforms that improve the liquidity, transparency, and integrity of the global economy. Our diverse offering of data, analytics, software, exchange capabilities, and client-centric services enables clients to optimize and execute their business vision with confidence. To learn more about the company, technology solutions, and career opportunities, visit us on [LinkedIn](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=iFeAj7p0dhLCgNXwzFsQa9LhbnmS_v_EowvcEgTa6TjFlRwR85tzEB5LZDtgma6GICmd5PBy6MLrnQUJUQNXoYU0dhwUpyr0D5LySbRu6Bs=), on X [@Nasdaq](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=KuXx5snIagvcoBrQbYXparaMjW9j8SYflFM94VQsc8fy3mbXTOMbj0uab4U6JjRNAMaX86MjNBLLXDO-4IQZqg==), or at [www.nasdaq.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=lz5dtrGl8V9gk_wAMQqPdR0gtKI9NLWPkQFmxqg3Juz22v6zqmOg3x7Rhg-31_5DwFuO-86NEU2O9uK6mzJ9Zw==).

**Cautionary Note Regarding Forward-Looking Statements** _Information set forth in this communication contains forward-looking statements that involve a number of risks and uncertainties. Nasdaq cautions readers that any forward-looking information is not a guarantee of future performance and that actual results could differ materially from those contained in the forward-looking information. Such forward-looking statements include, but are not limited to (i) projections relating to our future financial results, total shareholder returns, growth, trading volumes, products and services, ability to transition to new business models, taxes and achievement of synergy targets, (ii) statements about the closing or implementation dates and benefits of certain acquisitions, divestitures and other strategic, restructuring, technology, de-leveraging and capital allocation initiatives, (iii) statements about our integrations of our recent acquisitions, (iv) statements relating to any litigation or regulatory or government investigation or action to which we are or could become a party, and (v) other statements that are not historical facts. Forward-looking statements involve a number of risks, uncertainties or other factors beyond Nasdaq’s control. These factors include, but are not limited to, Nasdaq’s ability to implement its strategic initiatives, economic, political and market conditions and fluctuations, government and industry regulation, interest rate risk, U.S. and global competition, and other factors detailed in Nasdaq’s filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, including its annual reports on Form 10-K and quarterly reports on Form 10-Q which are available on Nasdaq’s investor relations website at_[ _http://ir.nasdaq.com_](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=T7m9dVO5DFa6WetOj80gqrIVk_WNPdIZEaEy_TnBMtbeWFDnLtl-7Py015PhyOvtTM6RcbIgM2JHNA9X7LrI6kiH5MyHZhNtC_QlOw9tVJE=) _and the SEC’s website at_[ _www.sec.gov_](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=vJdJssgwGWyWiwzv5YWBOJg_aRTGrR2rR-FDchvfxCJHGCwU4sYrGLvvwTyB9tk3hjWH0_pxd5WMLaZRMS2e1Q==) _. Nasdaq undertakes no obligation to publicly update any forward-looking statement, whether as a result of new information, future events or otherwise._

###
